summary: I LOST MY BRAKES WHEN EXITING OFF OF INTERSTATE SO LUCKY I WASNT GOING DOWN BIGGER HILL/MOUNTAIN. I WAS TOLD THAT I HAD BATTERY ACID ON BRAKE/VACUUM LINE. IM AWARE OF RECALL 2009-02. SHOULD I BE INCLUDED ? EVEN THOUGH SOLD AS 2010 ROADTREK WAS BUILT ON 2008 DODGE CHASSIS. CONT TO WORRY ABOUT POSSIBILITY OF  PROBLEMS DUE TO BRAKE LINE PROXIMITY TO BATTERY.

summary: 2010 ROADTREK SS AGILE MOTORHOME.
